title: RPCAU Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in interview for 02 Test Engineer Posts
description: The Rajendra Prasad Central Agricultural University (RPCAU) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 02 Test Engineer Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their M.E./M. Tech in Mechanical Engineering can apply for the RPCAU Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, a...
